channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can AI Fix Solar’s Scalability Problem?
item.description: AI is helping solar companies save time and money, but faster projects mean little without accuracy and trust.

item.title: Starbucks sells 60% of China unit to Boyu at $4 billion value
item.description: Luckin Coffee dethroned Starbucks as China’s biggest coffee chain two years ago by selling coffee at one-third of its price.

item.title: ‘Update And Shut Down’—Microsoft Confirms Windows Update Mistake
item.description: Update finally released as Microsoft confirms major changes for all Windows users and a serious issue with no fix available.

item.title: Apple Starts Silently Updating Your iPhone—Do Not Stop This
item.description: Apple issues update warning for all iPhone users — what you must do now.

item.title: Goldman and Morgan Stanley CEOs predict corrections of up to 20%, sparking global selloff
item.description: Wall Street expects tech stocks to take a hammering this morning.

item.title: Tala Health raises $100 million seed round, as Ritankar Das seeks to build a holding company for the AI era
item.description: Titan Holdings has launched a new operating company, Tala Health, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.title: Childcare is so expensive many families are just giving up now, forcing them to sacrifice incomes, savings, and careers
item.description: Bank of America found a 1.6% annual decline in the number of households making monthly payments in September.

item.title: Meet The Ex-Google Researchers Building AI Search For Law Firms
item.description: Legal tech startup DeepJudge has raised $41 million to build out customized search engines for law firms.

item.title: New EPOS Impact 500 Native Bluetooth Headset Is Powered By AI And BrainAdapt Technology
item.description: EPOS specializes in headsets for office workers. The latest Impact 500 model uses BrainAdapt technology and EPOS AI to make workers feel more producti...

item.title: Some CEOs have vowed to revolt against a Zohran Mamdani win. Jamie Dimon says he’ll ‘call him and offer my help’
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Norway's sovereign wealth fund to vote 'no' on Elon Musk pay plan

Fed president explains vote against interest rate cut
item.description: The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25-basis-points in October, though two policymakers dissented from the move, with one saying that he remains...

item.title: Bitcoin falls below a key level. The crypto may head toward $94,200 next.
BlackRock's Larry Fink says US still top destination for global investors to park money
item.description: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink said the U.S. will remain the top investment destination as money flows back up into American assets amid the AI surge and th...

item.title: Government shutdown blocks key GDP data release – what do the Fed's models say about economic growth?
item.description: The ongoing government shutdown has delayed the official third-quarter GDP report release, although real-time estimates from a pair of Federal Reserve...

item.title: Largest US airlines raise pressure on Dems to 'pass a clean CR' and end shutdown
item.description: Major U.S. airlines are calling on Congress to reopen the government as TSA workers and air traffic controllers are continuing to work without pay.

item.title: Obamacare prices are set to spike – here's why
item.description: Obamacare health insurance premiums are expected to rise 26% on average in 2026 as Congress debates extending enhanced premium tax credits amid the go...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
